description: Legitimate emails from trusted services, newsletters, notifications

emails.email_snippet: Here's what happened on GitHub this week. Check out trending repositories and updates from projects you follow.
John Smith, Sarah Johnson, and 3 others want to connect with you on LinkedIn.

emails.email_subject: Security alert: New sign-in to your Google Account
emails.email_snippet: We noticed a new sign-in to your Google Account on a Windows device. If this was you, you can ignore this message.
You received 47 messages in 5 channels this week. Here's a summary of what you might have missed.

emails.email_subject: Daily digest: Stories you might like
emails.email_snippet: Based on your reading history, we think you'll enjoy these articles about technology and programming.

emails.email_subject: New post from The Morning Brew
emails.email_snippet: Your favorite newsletter has a new edition. Click to read today's business news and market updates.
See your top songs, artists, and genres of the year. Share your music personality with friends.
Based on your viewing history, we've added new titles we think you'll love. Start watching now.

Your reservation is confirmed! You'll be staying at Cozy Downtown Apartment from March 15-18. Here are the details.
5 new people followed you this week. See their profiles and engage with your growing audience.

emails.email_subject: You have memories to look back on today
emails.email_snippet: You have memories from 3 years ago today. Take a look back at what you shared and relive the moment.
Here's how your posts performed this week: 234 likes, 18 comments, and 5 new followers.
The recording for 'Team Weekly Standup' is now available. Access it anytime from your Zoom account.

You're 65% through your Machine Learning course. Complete the next module and earn your certificate.
You're on a 30-day streak! Complete today's Spanish lesson to keep it going.
